answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a detailed clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Possible causes that may need to be considered include low blood sugar/ diabetes, cardiovascular causes such as arrhythmias, metabolic disorders, vascular issues, hypotension, dehydration, medication side effect, psychological causes such as stress etc. I would suggest getting this evaluated by an internist initially and depending on the cause diagnosed/ suspected, it can be managed accordingly or specialist care may be sought.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I blackout like 20+ times a day for the past few years. when I blackout i get dizzy, lose my sight, my whole body, face and mainly my lips go numb, i sometimes pass out or fall because i cant feel my legs, when i come too, i have a really bad headache that lasts a few second or a couple minutes. Ive had my blood pressure and blood sugar checked and there both fine i don't know what else it could be
title: I keep blacking out !
